features.title: Add comprehensive testing framework
features.description: Implement automated testing framework with unit, integration, and end-to-end testing capabilities to improve code quality and reduce bugs
features.business_value: Reduces development time, prevents regressions, and increases confidence in deployments
features.approval_notes: Essential for code quality and CI/CD pipeline

features.title: Add blockchain integration
features.description: Integrate blockchain technology for data verification
features.rejection_reason: Not aligned with current product roadmap and technical priorities

features.title: Test migration feature
features.description: Test feature to verify migration system works correctly
features.business_value: Validates that the new FEATURES.json system is fully operational

features.title: Test approval fix
features.description: Test feature to verify approval mechanism works

features.title: Bulk test feature 1
features.description: First test feature for bulk approval

features.title: Bulk test feature 2
features.description: Second test feature for bulk approval

features.title: Bulk test feature 3
features.description: Third test feature for bulk approval

features.title: Fix failing E2E tests for FEATURES.json migration
features.description: Examine and fix failing E2E tests in test/ directory (success-criteria-e2e.test.js, etc.) - Update test configuration for FEATURES.json structure - Fix timeout issues and API connection problems - Ensure tests work with new FeatureManagerAPI instead of old TaskManager - Update test data and mock structures for new schema - Verify all E2E tests pass with new system
features.business_value: Ensures test suite reliability and prevents regression bugs in the new FEATURES.json system

features.title: Implement comprehensive test coverage reporting
features.description: Configure Jest coverage reporting with detailed metrics, coverage thresholds for quality gates, multiple report formats (HTML, JSON, text), coverage collection for all source files, coverage scripts in package.json, and coverage reporting documentation
features.business_value: Provides essential code quality metrics, enables automated quality gates, helps identify untested code areas, and supports continuous integration workflows for maintaining high code quality standards
features.approval_notes: User-requested feature for comprehensive test coverage reporting implementation

features.title: Create comprehensive testing documentation and best practices guide
features.description: Document testing architecture, best practices, test suite execution, troubleshooting, FEATURES.json testing approach, and provide examples for effective test writing
features.business_value: Enables developers to effectively use and contribute to test suite, improving code quality and development velocity
features.implementation_notes: Comprehensive testing documentation completed with 4 concurrent agents. Created 5 documentation files: testing-architecture.md, testing-best-practices.md (v2.0.0), test-execution-guide.md (v2.0.0), comprehensive-testing-examples-and-documentation.md, and enhanced features-testing-approach.md. Includes complete framework analysis, best practices with real examples, troubleshooting procedures, and FEATURES.json testing strategies.

features.title: Integrate CI/CD Pipeline with Automated Testing Framework
features.description: Create comprehensive CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions workflow, test matrix for multiple Node.js versions, automated test reporting, pre-commit hooks, coverage reporting, and quality gates to prevent merging failing tests.
features.business_value: Ensures code quality through automated testing, reduces manual testing overhead, prevents bugs from reaching production, and maintains consistent quality standards across all code changes.

features.title: Test Feature 12345
features.description: This is a comprehensive test feature designed for E2E validation purposes. It includes detailed information to meet validation requirements and ensure proper testing of all system components and workflows.
features.business_value: Validates E2E testing functionality by providing comprehensive test coverage and ensuring all system components work correctly together in realistic scenarios

approval_history.notes: Essential for code quality and CI/CD pipeline

approval_history.reason: Not aligned with current product roadmap and technical priorities

approval_history.notes: User-requested feature for comprehensive test coverage reporting implementation
